verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَأَلَ س<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13912'>لُۢ ب</tajweed>ِعَذَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13913'>بٍ و</tajweed>َاقِعٍ
verses.translation: И вопрошающий спросил о каре

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِّلْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِرِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> دَافِعٌ
verses.translation: Для неверных, Которую никто не сможет отвести

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':321'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ ذِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13914'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَعَارِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ج</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: (Идущей) от Аллаха - Владыки всех ступеней восхожденья

verses.text_uthmani: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَعْرُجُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13915'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَةُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13916'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':10625'>مٍ ك</tajweed>َانَ مِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':10626'>قْ</tajweed>دَارُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ta'rujul-malā'ikatu war-rūḥu ilaihi fī yaumin kāna miqdāruhū khamsīna alfa sanah(tin).
verses.translation: (Ступеней, по которым) Ангелы и Дух к Нему восходят За день один длиною в пятьдесят тысячелетий

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>صْبِرْ صَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':1427'>بْ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13917'>رًا ج</tajweed>َمِيلاً
verses.translation: А потому терпи терпением благим

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ يَرَوْنَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بَعِيدًا
verses.translation: (День Воскресенья) они видят столь далеким

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَنَرَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>هُ قَرِيبًا
verses.translation: Мы ж видим близким (этот День)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ تَكُونُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13918'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ كَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8046'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُهْلِ
verses.translation: Тот День, Когда расплавленною медью станет небо

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَتَكُونُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13919'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِبَالُ كَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13920'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعِهْنِ
verses.translation: Подобно (волосинкам) шерсти, распылятся горы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَا يَسْــَٔلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمًا
verses.translation: Когда о своем друге друг не спросит

verses.text_uthmani: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ‌ۚ يَوَدُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13921'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13922'>جْ</tajweed>رِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13923'>ذِۭ ب</tajweed>ِبَن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>هِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yubaṣṣarūnahum, yawaddul-mujrimu lau yaftadī  min 'ażābi yaumi'iżim bibanīh(i).
verses.translation: Хотя они предстанут друг пред другом. И пожелает грешник (Искупить свои грехи) в тот День, Спасаясь от Господней кары, Ценой своих детей

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَصَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>حِبَتِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَأَخ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>هِ
verses.translation: Своей жены и брата

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13924'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّتِى تُــْٔو<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>هِ
verses.translation: И рода своего, который кров ему давал и пищу

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':3453'>ن ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ جَمِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':155'>عًا ث</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ يُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13925'>نج</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>هِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa man fil-arḍi jamī'ā(n), ṡumma yunjīh(i).
verses.translation: (Ценой) всего, что на земле, Что только бы могло его спасти

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۖ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَا لَظَىٰ
verses.translation: Напрасно! Это ведь Огонь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: نَزَّاعَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13926'>ةً ل</tajweed>ِّلشَّوَىٰ
verses.translation: Что вплоть до черепа Всего его поглотит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7934'>دْ</tajweed>عُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مَنْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13927'>دْ</tajweed>بَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: (В пылающее пламя) приглашая тех, Кто, отвращаясь, стал спиной

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوْعَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Копил добро и (в закромах его) хранил

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7137'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5969'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
verses.translation: Поистине, был беспокойным создан человек

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذَا مَسَّهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7875'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّرُّ جَزُوعًا
verses.translation: Когда его коснется зло, Он полон (бесконечных) жалоб

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13928'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَيْرُ مَنُوعًا
verses.translation: Когда ж к нему добро приходит, Становится он скуп (и недоступен)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13929'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُصَلّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: (Но не такие те), Кто (перед Господом) в молитве преклонился

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ د<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Те, кто в своей молитве постоянен

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ف<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَمْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِهِمْ حَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13930'>قٌّ م</tajweed>َّعْل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مٌ
verses.translation: И в чьем имуществе Всегда есть признанная доля

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِّلسّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِلِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12851'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَحْر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Для тех, которые о помощи взывают, И тех, которые о помощи (в смирении) молчат

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوْمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13931'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: И те, кто верит в День (Господнего) Суда

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9232'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9233'>ِم م</tajweed>ُّشْفِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И те, кто наказания Господнего страшится

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نٍ
verses.translation: Ведь наказания Аллаха Никто не сможет избежать

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И те, кто целомудрие свое блюдет

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَزْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>جِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُهُمْ فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُوم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Illā 'alā azwājihim au mā malakat aimānuhum fa innahum gairu malūmīn(a).
verses.translation: Довольствуясь женой или рабыней, (Которой он свободу подарил и в жены принял), - С них порицанья Мы снимаем

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَمَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9139'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9140'>بْ</tajweed>تَغَىٰ وَر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ فَأُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9141'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَاد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa manibtagā warā'a żālika fa ulā'ika  humul-'ādūn(a).
verses.translation: Но тех, кто за пределы этого стремится, (Мы) преступающими (нарекаем)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ ر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>ع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И те, которые блюдут доверенную (им поклажу) И добросовестны в своих договорах

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13932'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِشَهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>د<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِهِمْ ق<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И те, которые тверды в (правдивости) свидетельств

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И те, кто строг в часах молитвы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ فِى جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13933'>تٍ م</tajweed>ُّكْرَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Они все те, кто будут почтены В садах прекрасных Рая

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَمَالِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13934'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Так что ж с неверными, Которые спешат к тебе

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7424'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12807'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شِّمَالِ عِز<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Толпою справа и толпою слева

verses.text_uthmani: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَيَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13935'>طْ</tajweed>مَعُ كُلُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12916'>ٱ</tajweed>مْرِى<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9346'>ٍٕ م</tajweed>ِّنْهُمْ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13936'>َن ي</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13937'>دْ</tajweed>خَلَ جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َةَ نَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ayaṭma'u kullumri'im minhum ay yudkhala jannata na'īm(in).
verses.translation: Неужто все они желают В Садах услады пребывать

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَلّ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۖ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11326'>قْ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13938'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا يَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Но нет! Конечно, они знают И как, (и для чего) Мы сотворили их

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَـٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13287'>قْ</tajweed>سِمُ بِرَبِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13939'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَشَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِقِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13940'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَغَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِبِ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falā uqsimu birabbil-masyāriqi wal-magāribi  innā laqādirūn(a).
verses.translation: Клянусь Владыкой разных (фаз) восхода и заката, Что, истинно, Мы можем

verses.text_uthmani: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13265'>َن ن</tajweed>ُّبَدِّلَ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12743'>رًا م</tajweed>ِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: 'Alā an nubaddila khairam minhum, wa mā naḥnu bimasbūqīn(a).
verses.translation: На лучших всех их заменить И не допустим Мы нарушить то, Что Мы замыслили к свершенью

verses.text_uthmani: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَيَلْعَبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> حَتَّىٰ يُلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَوْمَهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12321'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى يُوعَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa żarhum yakhūḍū  wa yal'abū ḥattā yulāqū yaumahumul-lażī yū'adūn(a)
verses.translation: Оставь же суетиться их и пустословить, Пока свой День они не встретят - Тот День, что им обещан был

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11261'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11262'>جْ</tajweed>دَاثِ سِرَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13941'>عًا ك</tajweed>َأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13942'>بٍ ي</tajweed>ُوفِض<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yauma yakhrujūna minal-ajdāṡi sirā'an ka'annahum ilā nuṣubiy yūfiḍūn(a).
verses.translation: В тот День Когда они все выйдут из могил, И устремятся к Знаковому (месту)

verses.text_uthmani: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: خَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>شِعَةً أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4718'>بْ</tajweed>صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13943'>ةٌ‌ۚ ذ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13944'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13945'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يُوعَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Khāsyi'atan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum żillah(tun), żālikal-yaumul-lażī kānū yū'adūn(a).
verses.translation: Потупленными будут взоры их, Позор (всецело) их поглотит, - Таков тот День, Который им обещан был
